channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Suspects arrested over the theft of crown jewels from the Louvre museum in Paris
item.description: The Paris prosecutor said on Sunday that a number of suspects have been arrested over the theft of crown jewels from the Louvre museum in Paris last weekend.
item.content:encoded:
The Paris prosecutor said on Sunday that a number of suspects have been arrested over the theft of crown jewels from the Louvre museum in Paris last weekend.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: Eleanor Beardsley

item.title: Shooting leaves 1 dead and 6 hurt at historically Black university's homecoming fest in Pennsylvania
item.description: One person was killed and six more were wounded in a shooting Saturday night at Pennsylvania's Lincoln University.
item.content:encoded:
One person was killed and six more were wounded in a shooting Saturday night at Pennsylvania's Lincoln University.

(Image credit: Matt Slocum)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Trump attends ceasefire ceremony with Thailand and Cambodia during Malaysia visit
item.description: Thailand and Cambodia have signed an expanded ceasefire agreement during a ceremony attended by President Donald Trump.
item.content:encoded:
Thailand and Cambodia have signed an expanded ceasefire agreement during a ceremony attended by President Donald Trump.

(Image credit: Mohd Rasfan)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: How the craft flour movement could be a boon to farmers and Indian Country
item.description: As U.S. wheat farmers face painful losses in the global market due to President Trump's policies, one domestic flour mill on a reservation in Oregon is expanding its production twelvefold.
item.content:encoded:
As U.S. wheat farmers face painful losses in the global market due to President Trump's policies, one domestic flour mill on a reservation in Oregon is expanding its production twelvefold.

(Image credit: Photo courtesy of Andrew Snyder, Cairnspring Mills)
item.dc:creator: Kirk Siegler

item.title: Category 4 Hurricane Melissa threatens catastrophic flooding in Jamaica and Haiti
item.description: Melissa has intensified into a category 4 hurricane and could develop further to become a category 5 as it approaches Jamaica.
item.content:encoded: Melissa has intensified into a category 4 hurricane and could develop further to become a category 5 as it approaches Jamaica.
item.dc:creator: Kristin Wright

item.title: The White House movie theater demolition ends a storied era in presidential history
item.description: The vintage movie venue was destroyed this week as part of the Trump administration's plan to build a new $300 million ballroom. Former President Bill Clinton called it the office's "best perk."
item.content:encoded:
The vintage movie venue was destroyed this week as part of the Trump administration's plan to build a new $300 million ballroom. Former President Bill Clinton called it the office's "best perk."

(Image credit: The White House)
item.dc:creator: Chloe Veltman

item.title: Trump threatens Canada with 10% extra import tax over anti-tariffs ad
item.description: The ad, which used the words of former President Ronald Reagan to criticize U.S. tariffs, aired during a World Series game. Trump said that Ontario's premier didn't act quickly enough to pull the ad.
item.content:encoded:
The ad, which used the words of former President Ronald Reagan to criticize U.S. tariffs, aired during a World Series game. Trump said that Ontario's premier didn't act quickly enough to pull the ad.

(Image credit: Mark Schiefelbein)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: June Lockhart, beloved mother figure from 'Lassie' and 'Lost In Space,' dies at 100
item.description: The actor, whose career spanned films, TV dramas and soap operas, was beloved for her roles in "Lassie" and "Lost In Space." She died on Thursday of natural causes, a family friend said.
item.content:encoded:
The actor, whose career spanned films, TV dramas and soap operas, was beloved for her roles in "Lassie" and "Lost In Space." She died on Thursday of natural causes, a family friend said.

(Image credit: Louis Lanzano)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: First, came the Louvre heist. Then came the memes
item.description: From brands and influencers to a viral "Inspector Clouseau," the world's most glamorous theft is also quickly becoming one of the year's most profitable memes.
item.content:encoded:
From brands and influencers to a viral "Inspector Clouseau," the world's most glamorous theft is also quickly becoming one of the year's most profitable memes.

(Image credit: Thomas Padilla)
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Rosman

item.title: Picasso portrait of muse Dora Maar, long hidden from view, sells for $37 million
item.description: "Bust of a Woman with a Flowered Hat," a vividly hued Picasso portrait of longtime muse and partner Dora Maar, had remained hidden from public view for more than eight decades.
item.content:encoded:
"Bust of a Woman with a Flowered Hat," a vividly hued Picasso portrait of longtime muse and partner Dora Maar, had remained hidden from public view for more than eight decades.

(Image credit: Emma Da Silva)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press
